definition: to set one's heart on sth (idiom)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surname Men
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to think/to consider

sentences.english: All he ever thinks about is to get a good job.
sentences.chinese: 他现在一门心思想找一份好工作。

sentences.english: I busied myself with shopping, then turned my attention to our Thanksgiving table.
sentences.chinese: 我忙着购物，然后一门心思都扑到感恩节大餐上。

sentences.english: We can sometimes put so much time and energy into other people that we forget about ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 有时我们一门心思全花在别人身上反而忘记了自己。

sentences.english: The war filled people's thoughts every day; it was in the air.
sentences.chinese: 人们只是一门心思地想着即将爆发的战争。

definition: concentrating one's thoughts and efforts/single-minded/bent on/intently
wholeheartedly/heart and soul
to concentrate/absorption/concentration/engrossed
to concentrate entirely on sth/fully engaged/with full force
with single-hearted devotion (idiom)
solely preoccupied (with one thing)/engrossed/focusing (on sth)/to look after only one aspect
(coll.) all day long/all the time
to immerse oneself in/engrossed in sth/to lower the head (e.g. to avoid rain)/countersunk (of screws, rivets etc)
to pay no attention to outside matters
pinyin: liang3 er3 bu4 wen2 chuang1 wai4 shi4

definition: mind/thoughts/inclination/mood
erhua variant of 壓根|压根[ya4 gen1]
to do one's utmost/with all one's might/at all costs/(to work or fight) as if one's life depends on it
to be infatuated with
to think up every possible method (idiom); to devise ways and means/to try this, that and the other
heart and soul/wholeheartedly
lit. thousand ways, a hundred plans (idiom); by every possible means
